pois.title: Pullman Stuttgart Fontana
pois.description: The Pullman Stuttgart Fontana is located directly at the Vaihingen train station and has direct access to the A8 motorway. The New Trade Fair, Stuttgart Airport and Stuttgart city center with the main train station can be reached as quickly as the musical theater. The hotel has its own underground car park with 110 parking spaces and direct access to the hotel lobby. Our 252 hotel rooms offer all the amenities of a 4 star superior hotel. The 1200 mÂ² Fit & Spa Lounge with pool, sauna, sanarium, whirlpool and a sun terrace invites you to relax and unwind. For business lunch or dinner, visit our restaurant with outdoor terrace and enjoy regional and international food. The vibrant centerpiece of the hotel is the Fontana Bar. Indulge in fine wines, draft beer and international cocktails, as well as hot and cold snacks such as the classic Caesar salad or our Pullman burger.
